text: ,"What are the signs and symptoms of Potocki-Shaffer syndrome? The signs and symptoms can vary depending on the area and amount deleted. Some individuals with the syndrome have few issues and lead a normal life while others are very severely affected. The following signs and symptoms may be present:  Enlarged parietal foramina  Multiple exostoses  Intellectual disability  Developmental delay  Failure to thrive  Autism  Behavioral problems  Deafness  Myopia (nearsightedness)  Nystagmus  Cataract
